issue.title: [CF 1638] Item Cooldown broken for Potions
issue.body:
Icon type "Item Cooldown" broken I guess by game itself bugs because when you use it some times it doesn't start display visual effect on cd until you make /reload ui. Probably another broken API since 8.1 however can we do something during TMW itself?


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos | Imported from CurseForge issue #1638 | Raw

comments.body:
